sec.p: Potential cytotoxicity of the essential oils of F. tingitana was tested using sulforhodamine B (SRB) method of Skehan et al.[ 30 31 32] Human tumor cell lines: hormone-responsive breast (MCF7), cervical (HeLa), and liver carcinoma (HePG2) were used and maintained in the laboratory of the Cancer Biology Department of National Cancer Institute, Cairo, Egypt.
